query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hero_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  pageSlug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  heroTitle VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  heroSubtitle VARCHAR(500),
  heroImageUrl VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  overlayOpacity INT DEFAULT 70 NOT NULL,
  gradientColorStart VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'primary' NOT NULL,
  gradientColorEnd VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'primary' NOT NULL,
  gradientOpacityStart INT DEFAULT 85 NOT NULL,
  gradientOpacityEnd INT DEFAULT 70 NOT NULL,
  textColor VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'primary-foreground' NOT NULL,
  subtitleColor VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'primary-foreground' NOT NULL,
  minHeight VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'min-h-96' NOT NULL,
  published INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  pageSlug VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  heroTitle VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  heroSubtitle VARCHAR(500),
  heroImageUrl VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  overlayOpacity INT DEFAULT 70 NOT NULL,
  gradientColorStart VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'primary' NOT NULL,
  gradientColorEnd VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'primary' NOT NULL,
  gradientOpacityStart INT DEFAULT 85 NOT NULL,
  gradientOpacityEnd INT DEFAULT 70 NOT NULL,
  textColor VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'primary-foreground' NOT NULL,
  subtitleColor VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'primary-foreground' NOT NULL,
  minHeight VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'min-h-96' NOT NULL,
  published INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
